bad-channel: This command requires a channel with the following type: **{{ type }}**. You tried using <#{{ channel }}>.
missing-permissions: You are missing the following permission to use this command: **{{ permission }}**.
twitch-already-added: **{{ user }}** was already being followed in this server. You can only follow a streamer once per server.
twitch-db-error: There was an error while trying to register your follow for **{{ user }}**. Please try again later.
twitch-not-found: Couldn't find **{{ user }}** in Twitch. Make sure you are typing their username correctly.
